name: discount_id
description: The unique identifier of the discount

name: order_id
description: The unique identifier of the order where the discount was applied

name: timestamp
description: The timestamp when the discount was applied (order creation time)

name: discount_amount
description: The monetary amount of the discount applied (in dollars/euros/etc.)

name: currency_code
description: The currency code for the discount amount (AUD, USD, etc.)

name: quantity
description: The quantity of items to which the discount was applied

name: product_id
description: The product ID to which the discount was applied
